Interface IDoctorManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
DoctorManager
public interface IDoctorManager
Interface for managing doctor-related operations

  • Method Details

    • findDoctorById

      Doctor findDoctorById(String doctorID)
      Finds a doctor by their unique ID
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor to find
      Returns:
      the doctor with the specified ID

    • getAvailability

      List<TimeSlot> getAvailability(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves a list of available time slots for a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose availability is being retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of available time slots for the doctor

    • isAvailable

      boolean isAvailable(Doctor doctor, TimeSlot timeSlot)
      Checks if a specified time slot is available for a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose availability is being checked
      timeSlot - the time slot to check
      Returns:
      a boolean indicating if the timeslot is available

    • viewPatientRecord

      void viewPatientRecord(Doctor doctor, String patientID)
      Views a patient's medical record
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor requesting access to the patient's record
      patientID - the ID of the patient whose record is to be viewed

      prescriptionManager - the prescription manager to set

    • addDiagnosis

      void addDiagnosis(String selectedPatientID, String diagnosisID, String details)
      Adds a diagnosis to a patient's medical record.
      Parameters:
      selectedPatientID - the ID of the patient to add the diagnosis to
      diagnosisID - the ID of the diagnosis
      details - the details of the diagnosis

    • addTreatment

      void addTreatment(String selectedPatientID, String treatmentID, String details)
      Adds a treatment to a patient's medical record.
      Parameters:
      selectedPatientID - the ID of the patient to add the treatment to
      treatmentID - the ID of the treatment
      details - the details of the treatment

    • addPrescription

      void addPrescription(String selectedPatientID, String prescriptionID, IMedicineManager medicineManager)
      Adds a prescription to a patient's medical record.
      Parameters:
      selectedPatientID - the ID of the patient to add the prescription to
      prescriptionID - the ID of the prescription
      medicineManager - the medicine manager responsible for handling medicine inventory

    • getAllDoctors

      List<Doctor> getAllDoctors()
      Retrieves a list of all doctors in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all doctors
